body.content:
Deep Things of God Ministry
No. 21 Kriel Street ext. 19 Mamelodi
0019 Gauteng South Africa
Tel: +27 78 111 8895
Available on whatsapp

Dear Brethren,

I am asking for your generosity/kindness to help us with zinc’s for
the top-roof and the sides of our Church to prevent rain and wind
please..

As you support us with love and kindness, may the Almighty God
continue to bless you.

Remain blessed
Pastor Kenny
(Funder)
